directions.step: Beat the eggs in a mixing bowl.
Add the milk and mix well.
Add the sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla and mix.
Heat a pan at medium heat.
Melt 1/2 Tablespoon of butter in the pan.
Dip a slice of bread in the egg mixture and let soak for a few seconds.
Fry the slice in the butter until it is golden brown on both sides.
Repeat the previous 3 steps for each slice of bread.
Serve with fruit, syrup and/or powdered sugar.
